constituent: encounter, cadet, one, bend, sun, day, road
koohiiStory1: Close encounters of the third kind. The space cadet encounters aliens on the road.
koohiiStory2: Bender the cadet (see frame 1172) has an "encounter of the third kind" on the road. Reference to Steven Spielberg´s 1977 movie "Close Encounters of the Third Kind". Also a reference to popular stories of people reportedly chased by UFO´s while driving on the road.
words:
遭難(そうなん): disaster, shipwreck, accident
遭う(あう): meet, encounter (often something unpleasant)
